attributes.action: Make all companies with pension schemes place the pension assets in ring-fenced funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make all companies with existing pension schemes transfer the assets of these schemes to ring-fenced accounts at the rate of not less than 10% per year until they are fully ring-fenced. Ownership of the funds then to be transferred to the members as shareholders. Ring-fencing to mean that the funds may not be used for any other purpose than paying pensions.
